plugins.name: ShellIntegration
plugins.description: Enhanced Windows Shell integration with context menu extensions and file management tools / 增强的Windows Shell集成，包含右键菜单扩展和文件管理工具
plugins.changelog:
Version 1.0.0 (2026-02-05)
- Initial release
- Enhanced Windows context menu with custom commands
- Configurable menu items and shell extensions
- Integration with system optimization features
- Multi-language support (English and Chinese)
- Administrator privilege management for system operations
plugins.author: LenovoLegionToolkit Team

- Initial release
- Network acceleration functionality with DNS over HTTPS support
plugins.author: LenovoLegionToolkit Team
